<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Create an Alert Subscription"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/monitoring/alert/subscription"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This endpoint must be used to create an alert subscription. Although the category, level and name fields are optional, at least one of them must be entered at creation time.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"Root Type for AlertRequest","description":"","required":["subscriptions","filter"],"type":"object","properties":{"filter":{"description":"The alert filters.","properties":{"category":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}},"name":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}},"level":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}}},"title":"Root Type for AlertFilter","type":"object","example":{"category":["PIX"],"name":["Test"],"level":["Information"]}},"subscriptions":{"description":"The alert subscriptions.","type":"array","items":{"title":"Root Type for Subscription","description":"","required":["config","type"],"type":"object","properties":{"type":{"description":"The destination type of alert.","enum":["Slack","MSTeams","Email","Webhook"],"type":"string"},"config":{"oneOf":[{"title":"Slack","description":"","required":["endpoint"],"type":"object","properties":{"endpoint":{"description":"A valid URL.","type":"string"}},"example":{"endpoint":"https://test-slack.com/endpoint?querystring=123"}},{"title":"MSTeams","description":"","required":["endpoint"],"type":"object","properties":{"endpoint":{"description":"A valid URL.","type":"string"}},"example":{"endpoint":"https://test-msteams.com/endpoint?querystring=123"}},{"title":"Email","description":"","required":["addresses"],"type":"object","properties":{"addresses":{"description":"A valid list of emails.","type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}}},"example":{"addresses":["email@test.com"]}},{"title":"Webhook","description":"","required":["endpoint"],"type":"object","properties":{"endpoint":{"description":"A valid URL.","type":"string"}},"example":{"endpoint":"https://test-webhook.com/endpoint?querystring=123"}}],"description":"If the type of the configuration is 'Email', there must be an 'addresses' property with a list of valid emails. If it is Slack, MSTeams or Webhook, there must be an 'endpoint' property with a valid URL."}},"example":{"type":"Webhook","config":{"endpoint":"https://test-webhook.com/endpoint?querystring=123"}}}}},"example":{"filter":{"category":["PIX"],"name":["Test"],"level":["Information"]},"subscriptions":[{"type":"Webhook","config":{"endpoint":"https://test-webhook.com/endpoint?querystring=123"}}]}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
